resources.string: This app requires SMS and phone permissions to function properly. These permissions allow us to process messages and calls securely. Please grant all permissions to continue.
Some permissions are still denied. Please enable all required permissions in the app settings to ensure full functionality.
To ensure uninterrupted functionality, please allow this app to run in the background.
Please follow these steps to allow the app to run in the background:\n\n%1$s
Go to Settings > Apps > Autostart > Enable for this app.
Go to Settings > Battery > Battery Optimization > Select this app > Don\'t Optimize.
Go to Settings > Battery > High Background Power Consumption > Enable for this app.
Go to Settings > Apps > Startup Management > Allow this app to autostart.
Go to Settings > Device Care > Battery > Allow this app to run in the background.
Go to Settings > Battery > Battery Optimization > Select this app > Don\'t Optimize.
